## Source: ossf-package-analysis (db4300765f1658c2aea7cd741a96b021a92337dbb97807c037e67e130f02ce59)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'larger-batch-ctr' @ 94.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
